revised_title: Calibration of the Capillary Electrometer: A New Method for Determining Electromotive Changes
tldr: The author presents a new method for calibrating the capillary electrometer, allowing for the precise measurement of electromotive changes in short time intervals. The method involves using normal excursions and polar curves to determine the acting potential difference and sub-normal values, making it applicable to various types of dead-beat elements.
